Headline: #78 Montrose  Eastbound Temporary Reroute near Montrose/Marine Dr
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach eastbound 78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach eastbound #78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 35th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: EB #35 31st/35th buses will operate via 33rd/Cottage Grove (await recovery time), continue onto 35th WB due to heavy traffic/crowding at 31st Street Beach.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, Eastbound #35 31st/35th buses will only provide service up to 35th/Cottage Grove.

Eastbound buses will operate via 33rd/Cottage Grove (await recovery time), at schedule departure time, continue onto 35th Westbound, then resume their normal route on 35th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at UIC-Halsted. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at UIC-Halsted.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
